title: Pelosi says House is 'moving ahead' on trade deal with Mexico, Canada
text:
Pelosi says House is 'moving ahead' on trade deal with Mexico, Canada

Economy 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. Pelosi says House is 'moving ahead' on trade deal with Mexico, Canada WASHINGTON, Sept 26 (Reuters) - The U.S. House of Representatives is proceeding with efforts regarding the Trump administration's trade deal with Mexico and Canada, U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi told reporters on Thursday, saying House Democrats had discussed the pact a day earlier. "We're moving ahead on the U.S-Mexico-Canada agreement," Pelosi said at a news conference. "We're, again, hoping to be on a continuing path to 'yes'" to approve the deal aimed at replacing the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

Pelosi says House is 'moving ahead' on trade deal with Mexico, Canada
description: Pelosi says House is 'moving ahead' on trade deal with Mexico, Canada
